description:
If you're looking for a simple and efficient way of turning PDF documents into image files, you can try Vovsoft PDF to Image Converter.

If you're looking for a simple and efficient way of turning PDF documents into image files, you can try Vovsoft PDF to Image Converter. It's a lightweight, fast and easy-to-use application capable of converting PDFs to images.

You can easily extract image files from PDF files with this software. PDF files can be added to the task list by selecting multiple files using the built-in file browser or by dragging and dropping them via Windows Explorer. Just add PDF files to the list and click the "Save Image Files" button, this software will directly convert them to image files.

This software supports 2 methods:
- Snapshot: Each page of your PDF file will be saved as a separate image (PNG, JPG, TIF, GIF, BMP)
- Extract all images: Each image inside your PDF file will be saved as a separate JPG file

With this program, you can convert all the pages in PDF to images as well as select only a certain page range. Adobe Acrobat Reader is not required. And this software will not install any printer driver on your laptop or desktop computer. The best part of the program is that the conversion is done completely offline. You are the only controller of your private data. No PDF or image file is sent to internet in any case.
